description:
Hello everyone this course deals with fully about the web vulnerabilities and I explained how web vulnerabilities appears and how to solve that I make two video session for each vulnerabilities this is mainly focused on php website vulnerabilities it helps to develop your site vulnerabilities free

Course deals with vulnerabilities

  • Clicking
  • Cross site scripting
  • Cross site request forgery
  • Sql injections basics
  • Insecure direct object reference
  • Open url redirect
  • Directory listing
  • Avoid your site from automated web scanners

The following vulnerabilities are very very critical vulnerabilities so I created a video about web vulnerabilities and I will show explained how to fix this type of vulnerabilities

  • Learn php programming
  • Learn web vulnerabilities
  • Learn solution of web vulnerabilities


This course is mainly created to avoid site from hacking from the hackers this method helps to develop secured web
title: Learn Php Security Implementations - Tutorial in tamil
